fields.message:
Introduction to Header Settings Hey folks! So in this area we are going to customize the layout of the website Header. The Header basically consists out of your Menu, Logo and a Search Field that is optional. Please take a moment to watch our Introduction Video to the Header Settings where we explain some of the options.

When Finished

Once the Header has been modified to your preferences you can now head on over Flotheme -> 4.Pages -> Introduction to Page Settings, and follow the guide provided inside to setup your website Pages.
fields.label: Introduction to Header Settings
Overview for the Classic Header Type
Overview for the Trigger Header Type
Distance between the menu items on the left side of the Logo(in px)
fields.name: flo-cube-header__menu-items-gutter-left
fields.instructions: If you want to use the default value, leave it as '0'.

fields.label: Distance between the menu items on the right side of the Logo(in px) (copy)
fields.name: flo-cube-header__menu-items-gutter-right
fields.instructions: If you want to use the default value, leave it as '0'.

fields.label: Header Background Color
fields.name: flo-cube-header__background-color
fields.instructions:
Default: #FFFFFF

This setting does not affect the Header over a Slideshow. Headers over a Sideshow remain transparent at all times

fields.label: Enable Sticky Header
fields.name: flo-cube-header__sticky-header
fields.instructions: This feature keeps the Menu locked to the top of the page at all times

fields.label: A.1.1. Menu Trigger Background Color on Hover
fields.name: flo-cube-header__menu-trigger-background-color--hover

fields.label: A.2.1. Menu Trigger Icon Color on Hover
fields.name: flo-cube-header__menu-trigger-icon-color--hover

fields.label: A.3. Sticky Header - Menu Trigger Background Color
fields.name: flo-cube-header__menu-trigger-background-color--sticky

fields.label: A.3.1. Sticky Header - Menu Trigger Background Color on Hover
fields.name: flo-cube-header__menu-trigger-background-color--sticky-hover

fields.label: A.4. Sticky Header - Menu Trigger Icon Color
fields.name: flo-cube-header__menu-trigger-icon-color--sticky

fields.label: A.4.1. Sticky Header - Menu Trigger Icon Color on Hover
fields.name: flo-cube-header__menu-trigger-icon-color--sticky-hover

fields.label: B.2.1 Sticky Header Logo Image
fields.name: flo-cube-header__logo-image-sticky-header
fields.instructions: If the sticky header is enabled and it requires a different logo than the default one, then you can use this option.

fields.label: C.1. Display Social Icons
fields.name: flo-cube-header__social-icons
fields.instructions: If this option is enabled then the social links set in the 5.4. Generics -> Social Links section will be displayed.

fields.message: Used only for websites for multi lingual websites. Add the required widget in Appearance -> Widgets -> Header Translation
fields.label: C.2. Language Switcher Area

fields.message: The Fonts can be setup at Flotheme -> 8. Typography -> 8.1. Generic Typography.
fields.label: D.3. Contact Block Content Fonts

fields.message: This area will display the widget that will be set inside Appearance -> Widgets -> Header Translation.
fields.label: E.3. Language Switcher Area
